{{/* huge/env/Is Returns true if project env matches a given string or is present in a given slice of strings. @author @regisphilibert @context String | Slice (.) @access public @returns Bool {{ if partialCached "tnd-env/Is" "production" "production" }} */}} {{ $return := false }} {{ $env := partialCached "huge/env/Get" "Get" }} {{ if reflect.IsSlice $ }} {{ $return = in $ $env }} {{ else }} {{ $return = eq $env $ }} {{ end }} {{ return $return }}
